autoInsertSpaceInButton.description: When set to false, remove the space between the 2 kanji in the button
autoInsertSpaceInButton.description_zh: 设置为 false 时，移除按钮中 2 个汉字之间的空格

componentDisabled.description: Sets the antd component disabled state
componentDisabled.description_zh: 设置 antd 组件禁用状态

componentSize.description_zh: 设置 antd 组件大小

csp.description: Set up the Content Security Policy configuration
csp.description_zh: 设置 Content Security Policy 配置

direction.description: Set the direction in which the text is displayed. example
direction.description_zh: 设置文本展示方向。 示例

:getPopupContainer.description: Popovers (Select, Tooltip, Menu, etc.) render the parent node, which is rendered to the body by default.
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 弹出框（Select, Tooltip, Menu 等等）渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上。

:getTargetContainer.description: Configure the Affix and Anchor scrolling listening containers.
:getTargetContainer.description_zh: 配置 Affix、Anchor 滚动监听容器。

iconPrefixCls.description: Set the icon uniform style prefix
iconPrefixCls.description_zh: 设置图标统一样式前缀

locale.description: Language pack configuration, the language pack can be found in the antd/locale directory
locale.description_zh: 语言包配置，语言包可到 antd/locale 目录下寻找

popupMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. By default, min-width is set and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. false, which turns off virtual scrolling
popupMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 min-width，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。false 时会关闭虚拟滚动

popupOverflow.description: The pop-up layer display logic of the Select class component is viewport scrolling by default, and can be configured to scroll area scrolling
popupOverflow.description_zh: Select 类组件弹层展示逻辑，默认为可视区域滚动，可配置成滚动区域滚动

:renderEmpty.description: Customize the empty state of the component. Refer to Empty State
:renderEmpty.description_zh: 自定义组件空状态。参考 空状态

:theme.description: To set up a theme, see Customizing Themes
:theme.description_zh: 设置主题，参考 定制主题

virtual.description: Turn off virtual scrolling when set to false
virtual.description_zh: 设置 false 时关闭虚拟滚动

warning.description: Set the warning level, and if strict is false, the discarded information will be aggregated into a single message
warning.description_zh: 设置警告等级，strict 为 false 时会将废弃相关信息聚合为单条信息
